pages.text: RS Upgrades are used for making your RS devices faster/more effective. By using any upgrade, the amount of energy/t that this device draws will increase.
Upgrade Crafting Recipe.$(br2)The Upgrade is the base item used for every type of upgrade.
Speed Upgrade's Crafting Recipe.$(br2)The Speed Upgrade will increase the speed of the device that it is being inserted to.

Stack Upgrade's Crafting Recipe.$(br2)The Stack upgrade will improve item or fluid transfer speeds by using a whole stack instead of 1 item at a time. It can be combined with speed upgrades to let the device go to the next slot quicker.

Regulator Upgrade's Crafting Recipe.$(br2)The Regulator Upgrade is an upgrade that can be inserted into an $(l:exporter)Exporter$() to keep certain items or fluids in stock in the connected inventory. It will try to

keep the connected inventory stocked by using items or fluids from the storage network. As soon as the upgrade is inserted, you can right click on a filtered item or fluid in the Exporter GUI to configure the amount to keep in stock. Additionally, the Regulator Upgrade can be combined with a Crafting Upgrade to start autocrafting tasks when the stock from the storage network runs out.

Fortune Upgrade's Crafting Recipe.$(br2)The Fortune Upgrade will make the $(l:destructor)Destructor$() use a certain fortune level (depending on which Fortune Upgrade you have) on the block it is breaking.
Silk Touch Upgrade's Crafting Recipe.$(br2)The Silk Touch Upgrade makes the Destructor use Silk Touch on the blocks that it is breaking.
Crafting Upgrade's Crafting Recipe.$(br2)The Crafting Upgrade will schedule a crafting task when the item being used in a device is needed but not available.
Range Upgrade's Crafting Recipe.$(br2)The Range Upgrade increases the range of the $(l:distance)Wireless Transmitter$().
